body:
Use the downloads section for the latest development snapshots! Aigilas is currently in an early alpha period. 

[Check out the devblog](http://aigilas.net)

Encounter a bug? Want a new feature implemented? Hate something in the game? Shoot an e-mail to xbigtk13x@gmail.com
name: Aigilas
tagline: A 2D top-down action game with combat that is focused on chaining together skills.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
